entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
